review: I love my chromecast, use it every, for some reason it works better over wireless than any of the other devices in the house. It also looks gorgeous on my 1080p LCD panel. It's really never stuttered once playback begins when playing youtube or netflix, which is all I've tried thus far. PRAYING amazon decides to support chromecast somewhere in the near future. I can't wait to see what apps will be supported in the future.

review: This product replaced my XBOX 360 as our media streaming device. It shows a beautiful picture and works great most of the time. I have only had issues using this on netflix, the other apps appear to load quite well. Sometimes Netflix will not work and I have to start Youtube or Hulu plus up then switch back to netflix to get it to work. I'm not sure if that's a Netflix App issue or a Chromecast issue. Otherwise it works great. Great value too. Used with an iphone, ipad, and Nexus 7 Android tablet.
